# <a name="insert-a-picture-in-outlook-on-the-web"></a><span data-ttu-id="6ab93-102">網頁型 Outlook 中插入圖片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ab93-102">Insert a picture in Outlook on the web</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ab93-103">如果您想要新增您的電子郵件內文中顯示圖像，您可以新增內嵌影像。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ab93-103">If you want to add an image that displays in the body of your email, you can add an inline image.</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="6ab93-104">選取</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ab93-104">Select the</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="6ab93-105">**插入圖片內嵌**在撰寫窗格的底部。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ab93-105">**Insert pictures inline** at the bottom of the compose pane.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="6ab93-106">瀏覽至您的電腦上的圖片的位置，加以選取，，然後選取 [**開啟**。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ab93-106">Browse to the location of the picture on your computer, select it, and then select **Open**.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="6ab93-107">若要深入了解個人化您的郵件，請參閱[自訂您的電子郵件訊息，網頁型 Outlook 中](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41)的其他方法。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="6ab93-107">To learn about other ways to personalize your message, see [Customize your email message in Outlook on the web](https://support.office.com/article/079442eb-6b41-4ff5-b6e0-a83d3967ac41).</span></span>
